detail_desc: Necklace of thin metal chains with pendants. Adjustable length 36-44 cm.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts, fixed lacing at the front, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and no fasteners.
Long-sleeved dresses in soft, organic cotton jersey with a round neckline and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem.
Hi-tops with an adjustable hook and loop tab, elasticated lacing and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Jeans in washed, stretch denim. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, adjustable, elasticated waist and fake fly with a press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Sports top in fast-drying thermal fleece with a drawstring hood. Zip at the top, long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Shorter jumper in soft, rib-knit cotton with a high neckline at the front, lace-trimmed V-neck at the back, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with real suede details. Narrow shoulder strap with carabiner hooks at both ends and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 18x24 cm.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a viscose blend with raglan dolman sleeves, a ribbed neckline and short slits in the sides.
Fine-knit jumper containing some wool with hard-worn details and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Briefs in cotton jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.

Jumper in a soft cotton knit with a lined hood and long raglan sleeves. Zip at the top that continues around the edges of the hood, a kangaroo pocket and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted T-shirt in stretch, ribbed organic cotton jersey.

Long-sleeved dress in sweatshirt fabric and a pair of leggings in organic cotton jersey. Dress with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y), a rib-trimmed neckline and a gathered seam at the hem. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist.
Cardigan knitted in soft wool with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shorts in an airy cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, pleats at the front and detachable, soft tie belt. Fake fly with a press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Ankle-length dress in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Hat in braided paper straw. Width of brim 9 cm.
T-shirts in airy cotton jersey with a chest pocket and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Flip-flops with plastic straps and fluted ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Leggings in printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Sports top in soft, airy jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Lightweight puffer jacket in woven fabric with a hood and discreet zip down the front with a chin guard. Pockets in the side seams with a concealed zip, and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.

Chimi x H&M. We have teamed up with Chimi Eyewear to create three updated versions of the brand’s iconic sunglasses. This style has a robust, square silhouette with flat lenses. The frames are made from high-quality cellulose acetate that is both BPA- and phthalate-free. The lenses have UV 400 filters for 100% UV-protection, and the sidepieces and front are connected with seven-barrel stainless steel hinges. Text print on the inside of one sidepiece. Supplied with a hard case, cleaning cloth and a drawstring bag. Available in three summery pastel shades as well as in stylish black. Total width 14.2 cm.
Short dress in a soft viscose weave with a lace trim around the neckline and an opening with twisted ties at the top. Wide, 3/4-length sleeves and a smocked seam at the waist. Unlined.
Short, sleeveless A-line dress in jersey.
Knitted moccasins with soft terry inside, an imitation leather trim and soft suede soles.
A-line skirt in organic stretch cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Fitted jumper in a ribbed viscose blend with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Metal rings in various sizes and designs that can be worn on both the upper and lower part of the finger.
Hat in soft garter-stitched cotton with a ribbed hem.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in airy chiffon with an opening and button at the back of the neck, an elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt with an asymmetric hem. Jersey lining. The dress is made partly from recycled polyester.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The cotton content of the socks is organic.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a chest pocket and ribbing around the neckline. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a print motif on the front and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved bodysuit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Wrapover front with press-studs down one side and at the crotch.

Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and a double-layered, wrapover hood with a decorative drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined bikini bottoms. Low waist with wide elastication, and a high cut at the back.
Cotton canvas trainers with elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Knee-length dress in patterned jersey with a round neckline, short puff sleeves with gathered elastication, and a slit at the front.
Top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a rib-trimmed neckline, defined, padded shoulders and long sleeves.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey made from a cotton and modal blend with a deep neckline at the front and long sleeves.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with an opening and ties at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket trousers in washed, superstretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined swimsuit with a hole-patterned frill trim at the top, narrow shoulder straps and a gold-coloured appliqué.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with a round neckline, wide shoulder straps and double-layered yoke. Gathered seam at the top, a drawstring under the bust and a flared skirt. Unlined.
V-neck dress in satin with short butterfly sleeves and smocking at the shoulders and below the bust. Satin-lined skirt with a flounce at the hem.

Puffer jacket in a quilted weave made from recycled polyester with a stand-up collar and detachable, fleece-lined hood. Zip down the front with a ring pull and a chin guard at the top, and flap front pockets. Narrow elastication around the hood and cuffs. Lined.
Short-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood and kangaroo pocket. Second layer in contrasting colour jersey at the cuffs and hem.
Chino shorts in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Long-sleeved jumper in a fine knit. Round neck with a lace collar, a small opening with a button at the back of the neck, and lace-covered mesh at the cuffs and hem.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with hole-knit sections at the front and down the sleeves. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and rounded hems.
Cardboard pennants. Length approx. 3 m. Size of pennants 8x10 cm.
Set with a long-sleeved top in cotton jersey and skirt in a double layer of tulle. Top with a print motif on the front and a flounce over the shoulders. Skirt with an elasticated waist. Lined.
Slippers with a hook and loop tab at the top, faux fur linings and insoles and soft soles in imitation suede.
Mules in imitation suede with a decorative plastic buckle over the foot. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Short dress in airy chiffon with a deep V-neck with pleats and covered buttons at the top. Gathers on the shoulders, long puff sleeves and cuffs with a covered button. Seam at the waist and above the hem. Partly lined.
Aviator-style sunglasses with metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a gently rounded hem.
Leather gloves with the tops of the thumb and index finger in touchscreen-compatible material. Lined.
Shortie briefs in soft cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.
Shorter, straight-cut top in a sturdy weave with a slight sheen. Concealed zip at the back and wide, 3/4-length sleeves with wide elastication at the cuffs.
Lace tights with an elasticated waist.
Straight-style cardigan in a fine-knit viscose blend with low dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves and crocheted lace trims at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Dress in a soft rib knit with short sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
Jersey hipster briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Push-up bra in microfibre with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Sandals in cotton canvas with an adjustable hook and loop tab over the foot. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
GP & J BAKER x H&M. Tunic in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck opening at the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem. Unlined.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Top with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs. Bottoms with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and ribbed hems.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a zip down the front and along one leg, long sleeves and full feet.
